Notes.Text:
openldap2 was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2015-4000: The Logjam Attack / weakdh.org (bsc#937766).

This non-security issue was fixed:
- bsc#932773: ldapmodify failed with DOS format LDIF files containing '-' separator.

Vulnerabilities.Description: The TLS protocol 1.2 and earlier, when a DHE_EXPORT ciphersuite is enabled on a server but not on a client, does not properly convey a DHE_EXPORT choice, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to conduct cipher-downgrade attacks by rewriting a ClientHello with DHE replaced by DHE_EXPORT and then rewriting a ServerHello with DHE_EXPORT replaced by DHE, aka the "Logjam" issue.
